title: Spectral Gastropod
summaries: The Gastropod is a flying Hardmode slime that spawns frequently at the surface of The Hallow at night, and fires [img:Pink Laser]Pink Lasers which emit a faint light.

The [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version also feature the exclusive Spectral Gastropod variant. The Spectral Gastropod [img:Old-gen console version] fires a slow-moving orb that disappears after a short time/[img:Nintendo 3DS version] fires a Pink Laser, similar to that of the regular gastropod.
Like most other slimes, the Gastropod will be passive towards any player with the Royal Gel accessory equipped.
